text.div:
Search Parameter on employee Number for practitioner

Parameter employeeNumber:string

Search by employee number for a practitioner resource.

ResourcePractitioner
ExpressionPractitioner.identifier.where(type.coding.code='EN').value
Processing ModeNormal
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: Search Parameter on employee Number for practitioner
description: Search by employee number for a practitioner resource.
